listOfQuestions.question: Who is known for developing the theory of relativity?
Which scientist proposed the laws of gravity and motion?
Who discovered the concept of radioactivity?
Which scientist is known as the 'father of modern genetics'?
Who proposed the theory of natural selection in evolution?
Which physicist formulated the theory of electromagnetic radiation?
Who is known for developing the first successful polio vaccine?
Which astronomer proposed the heliocentric model of the solar system?
Who discovered the law of conservation of mass?
Which scientist is credited with the discovery of penicillin?
